title: The Unending search
creator_credit: Jack Keane, Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Australian Agricultural Council
brief_description: The role of scientific research in the development of Australian agriculture including the elimination of all the major cattle diseases and most sheep diseases; improved pastures so that they can carry more than twice the original number of livestock; increased crop yields; and better breeds of livestock.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack Keane, Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Australian Agricultural Council
